participant_1.background:
I enjoy strawberries because they are a sweet and juicy treat.
tomorrow is my first day of safety patrol.
i really like technology.
I pray to God for my family every morning and I eat well, but I have never been married.
I'm thinking about getting a new crib for my baby.

participant_2.background:
I love reading and writing about animals, so my favorite websites are those that feature stories about pets and animal rescue.
i had to get a job early as a child.
I'm a fan of Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors but I'm not much of a cook.
i hate tomatoes.
I'm not good at keeping up with my family, but I always stay in touch with my dog.

content.text: Good morning!
Good morning, how are you doing today?
I am doing well! I am looking forward to my first day of safety patrol tomorrow.
That sounds exciting! What is safety patrol?
It is basically an after school program that helps children learn about safety. I will be teaching them about fire safety, stranger danger, and road safety.
That sounds like a great program! I am sure the children will love it.
Thanks! I am really excited to get started.
I am sure you will do a great job!
Thanks for the encouragement!
You're welcome! What are some of your other interests?
I love technology and I am also a big fan of Jimmy Fallon.
I love Jimmy Fallon too! I also like reading and writing about animals.
That's cool! I love animals too. I have a dog and I always stay in touch with him.
That's great! I have a dog too. I love him to death.
I know what you mean. Dogs are the best.
They really are.
So what do you do for fun?
I like to watch the Raptors play basketball. I also like to read and write.
I like to watch basketball too! I am not very good at it, but I enjoy watching it.
Me too! I am not very good at it either, but I still enjoy watching it.
It's a lot of fun to watch the professionals play.
It really is.
Well, I should probably get going. I have a lot to do today.
Okay. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
You too
